subject: Alpine Skiing
Luge Racing
Cricket (Game)
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Skiers like Bode Miller got a look at the downhill course that will be used during the 2014 Sochi Olympics, and preparations continued for tennis players competing in this weekend’s Davis Cup event.
snippet: Skiers like Bode Miller got a look at the downhill course that will be used during the 2014 Sochi Olympics, and preparations continued for tennis players competing in this weekend’s Davis Cup event.
